channel.title: How many times have you beaten the Half Lifes?
channel.description:
So I just finished Half Life 2 for the second time, Twas epic. That makes once on my computer and once on my Xbox. I've also beaten the First Half Life three times.
HL: 4 HL O.F: 1 HL B.S: 0 HL2: 2.5 HL2 ep1: 3 HL2 ep2: 3 Portal: 4 how bowt u?!

item.title: How many times have you beaten the Half Lifes?
item.dc:creator: Zelfase
item.description:
HL: 2
HL O.F: 1
HL B.S: 1
HL2: 5
HL2 ep1: 10 (this one never gets old)
HL2 ep2: 7
Portal: I dunno, a quantity that is high above the rather large number of nine whole thousands after zero.

Read full topic

item.title: How many times have you beaten the Half Lifes?
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
Add another completion of HL2:E1 to my count. So…

HL - 1.9
BS - 0 (planning on buying on Steam along with HL and OF)
OF - 0 (planning on buying on Steam along with HL and BS)
HL2 - 2
HL2:E1 - 2
HL2:E2 - 1

Read full topic
item.source: How many times have you beaten the Half Lifes?

item.title: How many times have you beaten the Half Lifes?
item.dc:creator: eateroftheflame
item.description:
Charchar:

I still think it has nothing to do with the storyline of half life at all

Maybe if I get to see the chinese girl of Portal talk to Gordon in Half life EP3, I’ll think diff

Some people just never learn. As some people have said already.

  1. Aperture Science is in episode 2, it’s the company behind the Borealis

  2. Black Mesa is mentioned on slide shows in Portal and in Still Alive

the rest is speculation

  1. GLaDOS’s comments about things changing “out there” are believed to refer to portal storms or to the combine.

  2. Since GLaDOS and the overwatch dispatcher have the same voice actor some speculate that they are somehow connected.

Read full topic

item.title: How many times have you beaten the Half Lifes?
item.dc:creator: Dougtastic
item.description:
I’ve beaten the first one countless times, mostly on PS2. Half life 2 I’ve beaten maybe 3-4 times? The episodes I’ve only beaten once each. As for the expansion packs blue shift and opposing force, I am working on it. I always get so bored with those two. Have yet to finish them.

item.source: How many times have you beaten the Half Lifes?

item.title: How many times have you beaten the Half Lifes?
item.dc:creator: Charchar
item.description:
LimitBreak:

…You do know that Chell is of Latin descent, right?

Nope, I didn’t know that, is she colombian or something? =P

And yes I know what you mean, guys, but still, even if there are things that appear in both games (Half life / Portal) Gordon is never named in portal :bms:, neither that girl in Half Life :lambda:

Read full topic
item.source: How many times have you beaten the Half Lifes?

item.title: How many times have you beaten the Half Lifes?
item.dc:creator: PharCry
item.description:
Half Life Takes Place in 2000/1999 or something

Portal Takes Place in 2010/2011 or something

Half Life 2 Takes Place in 2020-2025 or something

That might be what is confusing you. >_>

Maybe in the Portal era… The combine haven’t advanced around enough…

Also at the end GLaDOS says, “Things have changed, since the last time you left the building.” >_>

Read full topic

I still think it has nothing to do with the storyline of half life at all.

It Does…

It’s a simple FACT that Portal’s story ties into HL2. :hmph: Stop saying it isn’t.

item.source: How many times have you beaten the Half Lifes?

item.title: How many times have you beaten the Half Lifes?
item.dc:creator: Charchar
item.description:
Brother Shrike:

It’s been repeatedly stated that it’s in the HL universe, and did you even listen to “still alive?” “Maybe black mesa… That was a joke, haha, fat chance.”

There are also a lot of powerpoint presentations that compare BM’s performance compared to Aperture’s.

Yeah I listened to all that stuff, but still, half life, OP, BS, all those are about the same storyline…but Portal?

Yeah … :meh:

Read full topic
